title: Trams in Halberstadt
text:
The Halberstadt tramway network () is a <a href="transport%20network">network</a> of <a href="tram">tram</a>ways forming part of the <a href="public%20transport">public transport</a> system in <a href="Halberstadt">Halberstadt</a>, a city in the <a href="States%20of%20Germany">federal state</a> of <a href="Saxony-Anhalt">Saxony-Anhalt</a>, <a href="Germany">Germany</a>.
Opened in 1887, the network has been operated since 1992 by (HVG).
